initializationAction: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/testformoney');
escapeAction: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/removemoneytags');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Hello! Welcome to the Exchange Service Corner. Would you like to trade in your BP for some fabulous prizes?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Which item would you like to purchase?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Which item would you like to purchase?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Which item would you like to purchase?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Which item would you like to purchase?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Which item would you like to purchase?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: 2 BP) A nutritious drink for Pokémon. When consumed, it raises the base Attack stat of a single Pokémon.

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run give @s cobblemon:protein 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound minecraft:entity.experience_orb.pickup ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run scoreboard players remove @s BattlePoints 2');
q.dialogue.set_page('buyend');
q.dialogue.set_page('buy1');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: 2 BP) A nutritious drink for Pokémon. When consumed, it raises the base Sp. Atk stat of a single Pokémon.

q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run scoreboard players remove @s BattlePoints 2');

q.dialogue.set_page('buy1');

pages.speaker: npc

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Here you are! Thank you!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/removemoneytags');
q.dialogue.close();

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Collect Battle Points and come again!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/removemoneytags');
q.dialogue.close();
